Returns the full database product name.

May be different than what the JDBC connection reports (getDatabaseProductName())

String liquibase.database.H2Database.getTypeName (  ) 

Returns an all-lower-case short name of the product.

Used for end-user selecting of database type such as the DBMS precondition.

String liquibase.database.H2Database.getDefaultDriver ( String  url  ) 

If this database understands the given url, return the default driver class name.

Otherwise return null.
